attributes.additional_details: Also babies have become ill due to parents not wanting to get there children vaccinated. It takes 10 seconds for the injections and babies are unsettled for a day or two but this is nothing compared to when children are in hospital with these deadly diseases that can be prevented!
attributes.background: I would love people to sign this petition to make immunisations compulsory, not only does it protect your own child from deadly diseases but protects other children around your own ! I have read so many stories about how babies have become ill through other children not being vaccinated.
